title: [Feature Request] Return Number of Model Parameters
body_html: Would be nice to call model.num_params() and be able to obtain the number of trainable parameters of a model. Especially useful during model summary printing. The PR should probably reference this: https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/finding-the-total-number-of-trainable-parameters-in-a-graph/1751/2
body_text: Would be nice to call model.num_params() and be able to obtain the number of trainable parameters of a model. Especially useful during model summary printing. The PR should probably reference this: https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/finding-the-total-number-of-trainable-parameters-in-a-graph/1751/2
body: Would be nice to call `model.num_params()` and be able to obtain the number of trainable parameters of a model. Especially useful during model summary printing. The PR should probably reference this: https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/finding-the-total-number-of-trainable-parameters-in-a-graph/1751/2
